alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 9:58PM EDT until September 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County. .Heavy rainfall will cause the waters along the Alafia near Lithia to rise into Flood Stage over the next couple of days. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alafia River at Lithia . * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, River Drive and Squirrel Run Way downstream of County Road 640 are completely covered by water. One home begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 13.2 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.2 feet on 08/28/1995. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Alafia River Lithia 13.0 11.9 Fri 9 pm 13.1 12.7 11.4 9.1 7.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 100 PM EDT.
